TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class DocumentReference : System.Windows.FrameworkElement, System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DocumentReference extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement implements class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument GetDocument(bool forceReload) cil managed

Docs.param: to force a new load of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference.Source%2A> document, even if it was previously loaded.
Docs.summary: Synchronously loads and parses the document specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference.Source%2A> property location.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the document has not been loaded previously, GetDocument will load the document regardless if the `forceReload` parameter is `true` or `false`.
If the document was loaded previously and `forceReload` is specified as `false`, the document is not reloaded and the previously loaded document is returned.
If `forceReload` is specified `true`, then the entire document will be reloaded and reparsed, even if it had already been retrieved previously.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetDocument(class System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument doc) cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks You can attach a document only if it has not been attached to this <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference> before.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for this document reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This dependency property is identified by the field. ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty SourceProperty

Docs.summary: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext.BaseUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Docs.value: The base URI of the current context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> interface.
